skills.title: Front End

skills.title: Data Structures & Algorithms
skills.description: Expert at many different data structures and algorithms.

skills.title: Team Work
skills.description: Collaborative developer fostering teamwork. Efficient when working with teams.

skills.title: UI and UX
skills.description: Passionate UI/UX front-end developer creating seamless web experiences. Expert in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Translating designs into user-centric interfaces.

portfolio.title: Pokemon Pokedex Website
portfolio.description: This was my first personal project. I used React and CSS to create a website that shows information about the first generation of Pokemon. I got all the information from the PokeAPI.

portfolio.title: Wordle remake
portfolio.description: This was a project that I worked with a team on. While it was an assignment for class, it was really helpful for teaching me how to work in teams in a large scale project. Created using Java and JavaFx.
